thread.title: Spokane police shoot and wound man
thread.title_full: Spokane police shoot and wound man - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Spokane police shoot and wound man
text:
SPOKANE, Wash. (AP) â€” A man is expected to survive after three Spokane police officers fired at him after responding to a domestic violence dispute.
Police responded to a dispute between a father and son early Monday morning.
Police say the son was in a vehicle in the home's driveway when they arrived, and then rammed patrol cars and refused to obey orders given by officers.
Police say three officers fired at him and at least one of them hit him.
The incident is being investigated by the Spokane Investigative Regional Response Team, comprised of multiple agencies in eastern Washington.
